body.p: The Board considered whether the 2018 Conceptual Framework should explicitly discuss assets and liabilities that arise in non-reciprocal transactions, for example, donations, income taxes and other taxes and levies. It noted that the guidance in the 2018 Conceptual Framework had been developed without assuming that all transactions are reciprocal exchanges. Indeed, some guidance—in particular, the guidance supporting the liability definition—was developed with significant thought given to non-reciprocal transactions.
